"Professional work and has great workers that gets the job done professionaly ." "I feel like I got a quality product for a fair price." "I tried to cancel the job and get my money back and he refused."

Tommy was paid for our cabinets and kitchen he was paid all but $800 he said he had to take care of his wife. In the meantime we had to hire a plumber to get water turned on in kitchen and bathrooms. Now we’re having to hire someone to … More
Finished exactly as promised. Website said tell us your vision and we’ll build it.  And that is what I got!
Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you so much Sean! Let us know if you need anything in the future!

Tommy’s Carports came out and went above and beyond my expectations building my patio cover.   Handled all permitting, Tommy and his crew were very professional.  Would recommend his company without a doubt!  Thank you Tommy’s Carports & Patio Covers! Response from the owner 2 years ago
